courses.subtitle: OUR COURSES
courses.title: Explore Our Courses
courses.description: Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned medical professional, our courses provide in-depth knowledge and hands-on experience in diagnostic ultrasound and cancer research.

courses.title: Advanced Ultrasound Techniques
courses.schedule: 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday through Friday
courses.qualification: High School Diploma or Equivalent | Bachelor's Preferred
courses.description: Master specialized techniques, including Doppler studies, 3D/4D imaging, and echocardiography.

courses.title: Diagnostic Medical Sonography (DMS)
courses.schedule: 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday through Friday
courses.qualification: High School Diploma or Equivalent | Bachelor's Preferred
courses.description: Learn the principles and practices of ultrasound imaging, focusing on abdominal, vascular, and OB/GYN specialties.

courses.title: Point-of-Care Ultrasound (POCUS)
courses.schedule: 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday through Friday
courses.qualification: High School Diploma or Equivalent | Bachelor's Preferred
courses.description: Designed for physicians and healthcare professionals, this course emphasizes real-time diagnostic imaging for bedside care.

courses.title: Oncology Imaging & Diagnostics
courses.schedule: 9 AM to 5 PM, Monday through Friday
courses.qualification: High School Diploma or Equivalent | Bachelor's Preferred
courses.description: Understand the critical role of ultrasound in cancer diagnostics and monitoring treatment progress.
